messages.content: You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who contributed the most to the canon?
August Derleth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was established by August Derleth and Don-Wandrei?
Arkham House
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What event marked a renewed interest in the Cthulhu Mythos in 1964?
The appearance of Ramsey Campbell
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What was Ramsey Campbell's first published collection?
The Inhabitant of the Lake and Other Less Welcome Tenants
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When was Arkham House established?
It was established to ensure that Lovecraft's stories would not be forgotten.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who heralded a re-newed interest in the Cthulhu Mythos in 1964?
A young British writer named Ramsey Campbell.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What terminology occasionally refers to Lovecraft's Cthulhu and Yog-Sothoth cycles?
The Cthulhu Mythos.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Did Lovecraft use the term Cthulhu Mythos?
No, Lovecraft never used the term Cthulhu Mythos.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
When was the appearance of Ramsey Campbell that heralded a renewed interest in the Cthulhu Mythos?
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is generally attributed to have coined the term Cthulhu Mythos?
August Derleth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is credited with creating the term 'Cthulhu Mythos'?
August Derleth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the primary reason for the existence of the Cthulhu Mythos?
The Cthulhu Mythos was created by fans and scholars who debated its definition and content.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How has the Cthulhu Mythos evolved over time?
The Cthulhu Mythos has been expanded upon by dozens, perhaps hundreds, of writers, both professional and amateur.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the purpose of the Cthulhu Mythos in the Call of Cthulhu game?
The Mythos allows Keepers to add or delete particular creatures and conceptions as they will, for the purposes of the game.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who is generally attributed to the term Cthulhu Mythos?
August Derleth
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is the name of the 1964 series of Lovecraft-inspired pastiches?
Call of Cthulhu
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What are some of Lovecraft's most famous Mythos creations?
Y’golonac, Gla’aki, the insects from Shagghai
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who brought the underground chthonians to the Mythos?
Brian Lumley
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are some of Lovecraft's most famous Mythos creations?
Y’golonac, Gla’aki, the insects from Shagghai, and a host of other creatures and god-like beings.
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are some other English authors influenced by Lovecraft?
Brian Lumley
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are some notable authors directly influenced by Lovecraft?
Gary Myers, Basil Copper, T.E.D. Klein, David Drake, and Thomas Ligotti
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who has made special contributions to anthologies of new Mythos tales?
Stephen King
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who are some notable writers that have made special contributions to Lovecraftian anthologies?
Pulver Sr., and Laird Barron, as well as Stephen King
You are a helpful AI assistant.
How have Lovecraftian inspired tales been adapted beyond print?
They have been adapted into feature and short films
You are a helpful AI assistant.
What is notable about the film adaptations of Lovecraft's stories?
They have been made by notable filmmakers such as Stuart Gordon
You are a helpful AI assistant.
Who directed the film adaptation of 'Herbert West–Reanimator'?
Stuart Gordon
